Name: Battle Imagine - Frost Ogre
Description:
Activates or advances Frost Ogre's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Frostquake.

Arcane! Frostquake
Summons Boss: Frost Ogre to swing an ice hammer in a spinning attack dealing Attack Damage, freezing hit targets for 5s. This skill cannot freeze targets with Resilience but will reduce their Resilience.
Upon the skill cast, your Resilience Break Bonus is increased for a period.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
